subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Proposals by Thomas Bach, the president of the International Olympic Committee, for setting up an Olympic television channel and reshaping the bid-city procedure received backing from 16 key I.O.C. and sports officials at a conference in Lausanne, Switzerland.
